alert.note: Alert for Bath (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 17 at 6:27PM EDT until April 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, west winds of 10 to 20 mph with gusts of 30 to 40 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in most valley locations will drop into the lower 30s late tonight, resulting in frost formation. * WHERE...Bath County. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 8 PM EDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft, through early evening. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered, late tonight into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
